special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

special_abilities.name: Underwater Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Ink Cloud
actions.desc: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.
